original_text: Do not consider it a hardship to set your servant free, because their service to you these six years has been worth twice as much as that of a hired hand. And the Lord your God will bless you in everything you do.
korean_text: 그가 여섯 해 동안에 품꾼의 삯의 배나 받을 만큼 너를 섬겼은즉 너는 그를 놓아 자유하게 하기를 어렵게 여기지 말라 그리하면 네 하나님 여호와께서 네 범사에 네게 복을 주시리라

sentences.original_text: Do not consider it a hardship
because their service to you these six years
sentences.korean_translation: 이육 년 동안 그들이 너에게 섬긴 일은

sentences.original_text: has been worth twice as much
as that of a hired hand
And the Lord your God will bless you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너의 하나님 여호와께서 너를 복 주시리라
